cause.description:
In India, an estimated 10 million prostitutes are trapped in the sex trade industry.* Often, they are either sold against their will into slavery by boyfriends, husbands, or family members. Some are kidnapped through various means of deception, such as the promise of a better life.
God is using us to rescue, protect, and empower vulnerable children as our own. These children were born in the red light district or were living in extreme poverty where child trafficking is most prevalent. Many of these children have been removed from dangerous situations and welcomed into our loving family where they receive an English education, excellent care, and hear the truth of Jesus Christ.
* The Nation, Human Rights Watch, Robert I. Freidman
The Story of Seema was graciously created and directed by Peter-John Campbell of Claymore Pictures.
http://vimeo.com/20040220
Our goal is everyone who watches this film donates $20 and helps change a life like Seema’s.
www.AsOurOwn.org
1. We rescue children from certain enslavement and exploitation.
2. We partner in the lifelong aftercare of the rescued .
3. We build Christ-based communities through biblical principles.
cause.mission: We are a Christ-based, community-driven movement in India that rescues vulnerable children from certain enslavement and exploitation, caring for them as our own.
cause.name: Redeeming Seema
